sn38.7:1.5: Sukha vedana, dukkha vedana, adukkhamasukha vedana—
sn38.7:1.7: “Atthi panavuso, maggo atthi patipada, etasam tissannam vedananam parinnaya”ti?
sn38.7:1.8: “Atthi kho, avuso, maggo atthi patipada, etasam tissannam vedananam parinnaya”ti.
sn38.7:1.9: “Katamo panavuso, maggo katama patipada, etasam tissannam vedananam parinnaya”ti?
sn38.7:1.10: “Ayameva kho, avuso, ariyo atthangiko maggo, etasam tissannam vedananam parinnaya, seyyathidam—
sn38.7:1.12: Ayam kho, avuso, maggo ayam patipada, etasam tissannam vedananam parinnaya”ti.
sn38.7:1.13: “Bhaddako, avuso, maggo bhaddika patipada, etasam tissannam vedananam parinnaya.
